widget.header: Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal

config: More 50-State Surveys. We worked on surveys on death penalty laws for the Constitutional Law Center, state income tax laws for the Tax Law Center, sex offender registration rules for the Criminal Law Center, and consumer protection laws for the Consumer Protection Law Center.
Justia Legal Dictionary. We implemented a new strategy for the forthcoming Justia Legal Dictionary as we learned more about how OpenAI works.
Blog Posts. We continued to contribute to our Justia Legal News blog with articles about intriguing recent cases in areas such as trademark registration and copyright infringement.
